name: N-iX
description:
N-iX is an Eastern European provider of software development services with over 1000 full-time experts that power software companies and other innovative technology businesses globally.
5 delivery centers in Ukraine, Poland, Belarus, and Bulgaria
Recognized by IAOP among The Best of The Global Outsourcing 100® providers
Ranked by Inc. Magazine as one of Europe’s fastest growing companies

Software Product Development

N-iX is among the fastest-growing IT companies in Europe. For the Third consecutive year, N-iX is recognized by IAOP among The Best of The Global Outsourcing 100® providers
